entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -17.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 02:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

Temperature: -17.0°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -22.1°C
Wind: NNE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
